ourStory.title: Our Story ??
ourStory.para1: Mousiki was born from a simple observation: music teachers in India spend more time managing admin tasks than actually teaching music. Between juggling WhatsApp groups, Excel spreadsheets, payment tracking, and Google Meet links, the joy of teaching gets lost in the chaos.
ourStory.para2: We talked to hundreds of music teachers across India and discovered they were all facing the same challenges - no visibility into student progress, missed payments, communication overload, and difficulty scaling their teaching practice.
ourStory.para3: That's when we decided to build Mousiki - a platform specifically designed for music education in India. Not a generic LMS adapted for music, but a system built from the ground up understanding the unique needs of Indian music teachers, schools, students, and parents.
ourStory.para4: Today, Mousiki helps hundreds of music teachers and schools across India manage thousands of students, bringing transparency, efficiency, and joy back to music education.
